manage_profiles.title: Manage Cycles
manage_profiles.description: Choose an action to perform on your saved cycles.

select_cycle_to_delete.title: Delete Cycle
select_cycle_to_delete.description: ⚠️ This will permanently delete the selected cycle

post_process.title: Post-Process Cycle History
post_process.description: Merge fragmented cycles (junk data) into single entries.

migrate_data.title: Migrate Data Format
migrate_data.description: Re-compress all saved cycle data to ensure it's in the latest format. This is safe and can be run multiple times.

wipe_history.title: Wipe History (Testing Only)
wipe_history.description: ⚠️ This will permanently delete ALL stored cycles and profiles for this device. This cannot be undone!
